title: DungeonSiege2[CD-CRACK]

Description:

>DungeonSiege2[CD-CRACK].exe

>Read Me.Txt

How to install this crack:

1st Step:
        MAKE A BACK UP OF THE ORIGINAL COPY OF DUNGEONS SIEGE 2.

2nd Step:
        COPY DUNGEON SIEGE 2 [CD-CRACK].exe & PASTE IT WHERE EVER YOU
INSTALLED Dungeon Siege 2.

 e.g. 
     
    C:\Program Files\Microsoft Games\Dungeon Siege 2

3rd Step: 
        NOW IT SHOULD ASK IF YOU WANT TO REPLACE THE ORIGINAL COPY 
CLICK YES.

4th Step:
       NOW u can play the game without a cd needed to play the game.
